full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN N'A RO MKHA' SPYOD MA'I LUS DKYIL GYI DBANG ZAB MO BSKUR BA'I CHO GA BDE CHEN MYUR LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MANG THOS RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I DKA' BCU PA BLO BZANG 'OD ZER GYIS PAn ZHVA SOGS DANG BCAS BSKUL ZHING GZHAN YANG DAD LDAN MANG POS BSKUL BA DANG, KHYAD PAR DU KHYAB BDAG BLA MA DAM PA'I BKA' STZAL DANG DU BLANGS TE, ^RIG PA 'DZIN PA BHIKshU KshANTI 'AM MING GZHAN RNAM SNANG RDO RJES DAM PA GONG MA'I GSUNG BZHIN DU SBYAR BA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN MKHA' SPYOD DU MYUR DU BSGROD PAR GYUR CIG ,
